title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The Next Cyber Frontier: AI, Fans, and Global Platforms (SPF208)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 下一个网络前沿：人工智能、粉丝与全球平台 (SPF208)
abstract: CISOs are navigating an era of unprecedented complexity while safeguarding the world’s most beloved entertainment and sports brands. In this discussion, security leaders from Anthropic, Disney, the NBA, and Amazon share how they balance innovation with resilience. Together, they’ll explore the evolving threat landscape, the rise of AI-driven risks and defenses, and what it takes to protect billions of users, fans, and customers worldwide. They will also examine how AI is disrupting security leadership—demanding real-time decisions and redefining what it means to protect entertainment in a world that never sleeps.
abstract_cn: 首席信息安全官们正在应对前所未有的复杂局面，同时保护着全球最受欢迎的娱乐和体育品牌。在本次讨论中，来自Anthropic、迪士尼、NBA和亚马逊的安全领导者将分享他们如何在创新与韧性之间取得平衡。他们将共同探讨不断演变的威胁态势、人工智能驱动的风险与防御的兴起，以及保护全球数十亿用户、粉丝和客户所需的条件。他们还将研究人工智能如何颠覆安全领导力——要求实时决策，并重新定义在这个永不停歇的世界中保护娱乐产业的意义。

presenter.name: Olga Bermant
presenter.title: Business Development for Cyber Startups and VC Funds
